info.name: YouTube Studio Dark Theme
info.description:
This theme was inspired by Leon Flame, please be sure to check out their theme here: https://userstyles.org/styles/185017/youtube-studio-vidiq-dark

If you would like to check out my channel, it can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/daniel55555d
info.additionalInfo: VERSION 8.0 - 17 April 2021 COMPLETE CODE REWRITE This is the largest update to this theme so far, I have completely rewritten the code from the ground up and I have made it much more efficient. (4825 lines of code to 740) VERSION 7.5 - 16 April 2021 - Added support for mentioning channels - Fixed tabs on Comments & Mentions tab (I haven't been mentioned yet so I do not have access to the tab) - Lightened the selected item on the toolbar to how it used to be - Fixed compound upload box VERSION 7.4 - 1 April 2021 The official dark theme is coming... sooo much code points to it... - Fixed radio buttons in upload screen - Brightened the warning text colour - Fixed badges in video details - Fixed hovercards in video analytics - Fixed lots of stuff in analytics VERSION 7.3 - 27 March 2021 - Added support for Intro videos - Hovercard on graphs is now dark - Fixed graph buttons - Icons on the top of dashboard are now white - Fixed icons in posts tab - Fixed What's new in studio icons - Fixed Ideas for you text - Fixed error screen VERSION 7.2 - 22 March 2021 - Fixed Other videos list - Removed border from bell icon - Darkened subtext - Fixed hover colour of icons in Dashboard VERSION 7.1 - 17 March 2021 - Added support for Checks tab on the upload screen - Icons on upload screen are now red - Fixed smart replies on comments - Fixed comment options VERSION 7.0 - 16 March 2021 - Added support for Live Subscriber Count - Removed support for Social Blade Live Subscriber Count - Create button now appears grey when hovering - Fixed arrow on dropdown boxes - Fixed icons in Layout tab - Fixed hoverbox in channel analytics - Fixed other channels tab in Audience - Fixed show more button on upload tab - Fixed text when deleting videos VERSION 6.14 - 15 March 2021 With the changes YouTube is making to their code, I think an official dark theme is coming! - Brightened dashboard to match header - Fixed color of spacer on the header - Fixed tabs on comments - Fixed click colour on tabs - Fixed icons in content tab VERSION 6.13 - 13 March 2021 - Fixed icons on sidebar VERSION 6.12 - 7 March 2021 - Fixed header on Advanced Analytics VERSION 6.11 - 4 March 2021 - Fixed the red buttons in dashboard - Altered the create button hover colour - Loading bar is now red again - Community tab comment thumbnails are dark now VERSION 6.10 - 3 March 2021 - Fixed black icon issue in sidebar - Added support for new views graph thing VERSION 6.9.2 - 23 February 2021 - Fixed the background of the visibility selector when uploading cideos. VERSION 6.9.1 - 23 February 2021 - YouTube changed something in YT Studio that made the accent colour pink... it is now no longer pink. VERSION 6.9 - 21 February 2021 - Fixed Upload Videos card in Dashboard - Fixed banner in Copyright Claims VERSION 6.8 - 2 February 2021 - Added support for reporting comments VERSION 6.7 - 23 January 2021 - Fixed the look of the error when an upload is abandoned (Video too long) - Delete Draft button is red - Loading screen is no longer white for the upload screen VERSION 6.6 - 16 January 2021 - Fixed a hover card in Engagement tab in video analytics - Fixed Request Review button on AdRates Scorecard VERSION 6.5.3 - 15 January 2021 - Fixed Show More description when editing videos VERSION 6.5.2 - 14 January 2021 - Fixed white background in subscribers list VERSION 6.5.1 - 11 January 2021 - Fixed copyright claim blocked locations list VERSION 6.5 - 9 January 2021 - Removed the white overlay when loading parts of the website - Made the pie graphs in "Reach" darker VERSION 6.4 - 4 January 2021 - Added support for the Copyright Claim screen - Added support for the Copyright Strike screen - Buttons for notifications in dashboard are red VERSION 6.3 - 1 January 2021 - Added support for the YouTube Monetisation scorecard - Text containers on the upload screen are brighter now - Fixed some colours of text and dividers on the upload screen - Hovering over upload steps is red instead of blue 2020 Updates have moved to here - https://pastebin.com/wjszqeJa

data.title: Upload Title in Upload popup in bottom right
